scripts.windows-zip-layer: cp node_modules/, package.json nodejs && Compress-Archive nodejs/ layer.zip
scripts.unix-zip-layer: if [ ! -e nodejs ]; then mkdir nodejs; fi && cp -r node_modules package.json nodejs && zip -r layer.zip nodejs/*
scripts.deploy-layer: aws lambda publish-layer-version --layer-name take-challenge-layer --compatible-runtimes nodejs14.x --zip-file fileb://layer.zip
